name: CrystalTank
description:
Welcome to CrystalTank, a unique top-down shooter with bosses and powerups! CrystalTank is now part of a new development team called ChickenOven Studios. Check us out here: www.chickenoven.tk

Current version: 2.1.4

Red tanks can take 2 hits and deal 1 damage.

Pink tanks are faster, can take 3 hits and deal 1 damage.

Bosses are slower, but can take 20 hits and deal 5 damage.

The goal is to survive as long as you can!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Shoot

Powerups get picked up automatically.

Credits (all music and sound effects are safe from copyright):

AlphaDream - In the Final (Mario&Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story)

Nintendo - Super Mario powerup spawn and pickup sound

Undertale (Toby Fox) - ''Enemy Approaching'' and ''Determination''

Untold Journey - The Pirate King

Update log:

2 June 2018 - v1 released. Base game with a single boss added.

2 June 2018 - v2 released. Added music, a new boss, powerups, sound effects.

3 June 2-18 - v2.1 released. Added improved animations, more random powerup spawns, a few balance changes.

Added a new Game Over sound (credits to Toby Fox). Greatly improved all graphics.

Added a new powerup - Black Bomb. Destroys all enemies on screen.

Added difficulties.

5 June 2018 - v2.1.1 released. Patched a bug where bullets would pierce enemies on the left side, but not on the right side. Bullets don't pierce any longer.

5 July 2020 - v2.1.4 released. Made the code a little bit tidier overall. The game is possibly more stable and has less bugs.  Added the ChickenOven Studios logo and sound effect. Fixed a bug where the ''Game Over'' screen would not cover the entire screen. Fixed a bug where the second boss theme wouldn't play properly.

Balance changes:

3 June 2018:

Reduced the spawn timer of all enemies by 0.5 seconds.

Increased the spawn rate of all powerups and randomized them more.

Increased the health of all bosses by 2 HP.

Reduced the extra HP of Green Heart by 1.

Reduced the extra fire rate of Orange Flame by 0.07 seconds.

5 July 2020:

Increased the extra fire rate of Orange Flame by 0.05 seconds.

Reduced difficulty across the board (spawn rates and enemy movement speed).
